meanings.definition: Attached or connected to something else
meanings.sent1: The appendent document was stapled to the main report.
meanings.sent2: The keys were appendent to the keychain.
meanings.sent3: The appendent sticker on the laptop made it look unique.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an appendent ray of sunshine in the room.
meanings.sent5: The appendent flower on the tree added a pop of color.

meanings.definition: A thing that is attached or added to something else
meanings.sent1: The appendent to the contract needed to be signed.
meanings.sent2: The new wing of the building was an appendent to the original structure.
meanings.sent3: The appendent to the outfit was a stylish scarf.
meanings.sent4: His backpack felt like an appendent burden on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The appendent of the necklace completed her look.
